channel.title: Div background image not displaying on iPhone
channel.description: Hi guys. On my site here: www.emergypower.com, for some reason the main background image doesn't load on iPhones. I've tried to find a way around it but I can't fix it. Does anyone know what the problem could be?

item.title: Div background image not displaying on iPhone
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Yeah, try adding the legacy attribute of background-image or use background: url()

Read full topic
item.source: Div background image not displaying on iPhone

item.title: Div background image not displaying on iPhone
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

I would guess lack of CSS3 support.
background is the CSS3 name, background-image is the previous name for the property.

Read full topic
item.source: Div background image not displaying on iPhone

item.title: Div background image not displaying on iPhone
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:4, topic:549686”]It is not only iPhone that can’t handle your site.

http://browsershots.org/http://www.emergypower.com/[/quote]

They all seem to be suffering from the same error. I wonder what’s causing it.

Read full topic

item.title: Div background image not displaying on iPhone
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

The file not displaying is this one: http://emergypower.com/assets/images/attraction.png

A png file, unfortunately.

item.source: Div background image not displaying on iPhone

item.title: Div background image not displaying on iPhone
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

Safari has a bug displaying jpegs. Make sure the jpeg isn’t in progressive format - or save it in a different file type. (.gif, .png, blah blah)

Read full topic
